name: Lindsay Corporation
description: Lindsay Corporation is a leading provider of irrigation and infrastructure products and services, primarily focused on the agricultural sector. Established in 1955 and headquartered in Omaha, Nebraska, Lindsay has built a reputation for innovation and quality in the development of advanced irrigation systems. The company's flagship product, the Zimmatic center pivot irrigation system, is known for its efficiency and cutting-edge technology, enabling farmers to optimize the use of water resources while improving crop yields. Lindsay's irrigation solutions are designed to address the challenges of modern agriculture, promoting sustainable practices and helping farmers maximize profitability. In addition to irrigation, Lindsay offers a range of infrastructure products including road safety systems and barriers, contributing to safer roads and highways. The company is committed to enhancing agricultural productivity and infrastructure safety through continuous innovation, high-quality manufacturing, and exceptional customer service. With a strong presence in both domestic and international markets, Lindsay Corporation is dedicated to advancing sustainable farming practices and supporting the global food supply chain.
